title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product management, cart functionality, payments, and user authentication.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team workspaces, and progress tracking.

title: Financial Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard for financial data visualization with charts, filters, and exportable reports.

title: Social Media Platform
description: A social networking application with user profiles, posts, comments, and real-time notifications.

title: Weather Application
description: A weather forecast application with location detection, daily and hourly forecasts, and severe weather alerts.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A recipe discovery application with search filters, favorites, and step-by-step cooking instructions.
